text: Heterotrichus is a genus of leaf beetles in the subfamily Eumolpinae. It is distributed in Southeast Asia and Southern China. ==Species== * Heterotrichus balyi Chapuis, 1874 * Heterotrichus hirsutus (Tan & Wang, 2005) Synonyms: * Heterotrichus violaceus (Jacoby, 1889): synonym of Heterotrichus balyi Chapuis, 1874 ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Chrysomelidae genera Category:Beetles of Asia Category:Taxa named by Félicien Chapuis
title: Heterotrichus
